title: System Test Validation
description: As a QA engineer, I want to execute comprehensive system tests so that I can verify application functionality meets requirements.
soThat: I can verify application functionality meets requirements
acceptanceCriteria: Given test scenarios are defined, when tests are executed, then all critical paths pass validation
Given system components are integrated, when end-to-end tests run, then data flows correctly between services
Given performance benchmarks exist, when load tests execute, then response times meet SLA requirements
